gmcm.skipIntro.name: Skip logos & intro movies
gmcm.skipIntro.tooltip: Automatically skip the ConcernedApe / Chucklefish logos and intro movies when the game launches.
gmcm.skipTitleIdle.name: Skip title screen idle
gmcm.skipTitleIdle.tooltip: Jump past the title screen idle animation as soon as possible.
gmcm.autoLoad.name: Auto-open Load Game menu
gmcm.autoLoad.tooltip: Open the Load Game menu automatically after the title screen. On First Launch does this only once per session.
gmcm.quickResume.name: Enable quick resume
gmcm.quickResume.tooltip: Automatically load your last played save unless the interrupt key is held during startup.
gmcm.quickResume.key.name: Quick resume interrupt key
gmcm.quickResume.key.tooltip: Hold this key during startup to show the normal title menu instead of auto-loading.
gmcm.diagnostics.name: Enable diagnostics logging
gmcm.diagnostics.tooltip: Log startup timing information to the SMAPI console to help troubleshoot slow boots.
